radiographic_examinations.findings: heterogeneous lobular mass (6 cm in diameter) in the pelvis
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Large heterogeneous rounded mass in the right lower quadrant on second admission measuring 8.4 cm by 10.8 cm by 7.1 cm.

radiographic_examinations.findings: heterogeneous, lobulated mass (5.7 cm by 6.5 cm) in the pelvis; fat plane separating lesion from bladder
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: On second admission, mass measuring 8.2 cm by 10.7 cm by 8.7 cm with areas of central fluid causing partial obstruction of both ureters and severe compression of urinary bladder.

radiographic_examinations.findings: large heterogeneous mass filling much of the pelvis and lower abdomen, with compression of the urinary bladder resulting in mild bilateral hydronephrosis
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Mass grew to 10.7 cm in greatest dimension with severe compression of the urinary bladder.
